title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025- 05 DATED JULY 25, 2025, ENTITLED ”RESOLUTION ALLOCATING THE 594 MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND CY 2025 - 3096 QUICK RESPONSE FUND AMOUNTING TO SEVEN MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND FOUR HUNDRED FORTY-FIVE PESOS AND 68/100 (PHP 7,751,445.68) FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES XND APPROVING THE SAME.”
